actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The voidling makes four Shadow Tendril or Necrotic Bolt attacks. If two Necrotic Bolt attacks hit one creature, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Shadow Tendril
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Necrotic Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Shadow's Grasp (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The voidling releases a wave of small, grasping tendrils of shadow. Each creature within 20 feet of it must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 49 (14d6) necrotic damage and is restrained by tendrils of shadow for 1 minute. On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn't restrained. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

special_abilities.name: Darkness Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: While in an area of dim light or darkness, the voidling regains 5 hp at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hp.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The voidling has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Void Traveler
special_abilities.desc: The voidling doesn't require air, food, drink, sleep, or ambient pressure.
